sections.name: Breakfast
sections.description: Begin your day with a delightful selection of morning classics, crafted to fuel your day ahead.

items.name: Classic American Breakfast
items.description: A hearty combo of scrambled eggs, crispy bacon, golden hash browns, and toast.

items.name: Pancakes and Syrup
items.description: Fluffy pancakes with a sweet maple syrup drizzle and a dollop of butter.

items.name: Eggs Benedict
items.description: Poached eggs on an English muffin, topped with Canadian bacon and velvety hollandaise sauce.

items.name: Breakfast Burrito
items.description: A tortilla stuffed with scrambled eggs, choice of sausage or bacon, cheese, and zesty salsa.

items.name: Belgian Waffles
items.description: Thick, crispy waffles crowned with fresh berries and whipped cream.

items.name: Omelette
items.description: Create your own with cheese, mushrooms, peppers, onions, and more.

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Grilled bread soaked in a sweet egg mixture, dusted with sugar, and served with syrup.

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Toasted bread layered with creamy mashed avocado, poached eggs, and a touch of seasoning.

items.name: Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: Your choice of eggs, bacon or sausage, sandwiched between a roll or English muffin.

items.name: Veggie Breakfast Bowl
items.description: Sautéed veggies, quinoa or rice, topped with a poached egg and avocado.

items.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
items.description: Layers of Greek yogurt, crunchy granola, and fresh berries drizzled with honey.

sections.name: Lunch
sections.description: Discover a world of tastes with our lunchtime favourites, each dish designed to satisfy your cravings and elevate your lunch experience.

items.name: Classic Cheeseburger
items.description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles in a soft bun.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: BLT Sandwich
items.description: Crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato on toasted bread with mayo.

items.name: Chicken Club Wrap
items.description: Grilled chicken, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and ranch dressing wrapped in a tortilla.

items.name: Vegetarian Pizza
items.description: Thin crust pizza with a medley of fresh veggies and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.description: Tender pasta topped with rich, meaty Bolognese sauce and grated Parmesan.

items.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwich
items.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork smothered in barbecue sauce on a toasted bun.

items.name: Grilled Cheese & Tomato Soup
items.description: Melted cheese between slices of grilled bread, served with a side of tomato soup.

items.name: Cobb Salad
items.description: Chopped lettuce, grilled chicken, bacon, avocado, eggs, and blue cheese dressing.

items.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
items.description: A medley of fresh vegetables stir-fried with tofu in a savory sauce, served over rice.

items.name: Shrimp Tacos
items.description: Grilled shrimp, cabbage slaw, and chipotle mayo in soft tortillas, served with lime wedges.

sections.name: Dinner
sections.description: Indulge in the epitome of culinary excellence under the stars with our exquisite dinner offerings, where every bite is an experience worth savoring.

items.name: Grilled Ribeye Steak
items.description: A tender and juicy ribeye steak grilled to perfection, served with garlic mashed potatoes and sautéed vegetables.

items.name: Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce
items.description: Fresh salmon fillet drizzled with lemon-dill sauce, accompanied by wild rice and steamed asparagus.

items.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
items.description: Creamy Alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine pasta and grilled chicken, garnished with parsley.

items.name: Vegetable Lasagna
items.description: Layers of pasta, ricotta cheese, spinach, and marinara sauce, baked to perfection.

items.name: Bacon-Wrapped Scallops
items.description: Plump scallops wrapped in crispy bacon, served with a lemon-butter sauce and rice pilaf.

items.name: Mushroom Risotto
items.description: Creamy risotto infused with wild mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and fresh herbs.

items.name: BBQ Ribs Platter
items.description: Fall-off-the-bone BBQ ribs served with coleslaw, cornbread, and seasoned fries.

items.name: Lobster Tail with Garlic Butter
items.description: Lobster tail brushed with garlic butter, paired with mashed sweet potatoes and grilled asparagus.

items.name: Eggplant Parmesan
items.description: Slices of eggplant breaded and baked, topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese, served with spaghetti.

items.name: Beef Tacos
items.description: Seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa in soft tortillas, served with rice and beans.

items.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
items.description: A mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served over steamed jasmine rice.
